episodes.title: From Cult to CEO - Why 1/3 of People Will Die With Their Dreams (EP3)
episodes.description:
Fear of failure is killing more dreams than failure ever could. 1 in 3 people never even start chasing their dream. Why? Because 49% of us are more afraid of failing than of dying.

But here’s the truth: Failure isn’t your enemy, it’s the price of success. Thomas Edison failed over 1,000 times before inventing the lightbulb. J.K. Rowling was rejected by 12 publishers before Harry Potter became a global phenomenon. Imagine if they quit?

So what’s really holding YOU back?
This video is your wake-up call to stop letting fear decide your future. If you’re tired of playing small, this will hit you hard—in the best way.

Watch this if:
- You’re scared of looking stupid or failing.
- You’re waiting for “perfect” before you start.
- You know deep down you’re meant for more. 

Be more? Download the FREE ‘No More Excuses’ workbook → https://www.mrjones.store/no-more-excuses

Timestamp:
0:00–0:24 Intro
0:24–1:17 Scarier than DEATH
1:17–5:32 True meaning of failure!
5:32–7:28 My greatest failure
7:28–8:23 Conclusion

#FearOfFailure #OvercomeFear #ChaseYourDreams #FailureIsFuel #MindsetShift

episodes.title: From Cult to CEO - The truth about reinventing yourself (Ep. 2)
episodes.description:
I didn’t just change careers — I had to rebuild my identity.
Leaving the cult was just the beginning.
Becoming a CEO meant facing emotions I’d suppressed, beliefs I’d inherited, and fears I didn’t know I had.

In this episode, I open up about the real transformation — not just from cult member to entrepreneur, but from follower to leader. I share what I had to unlearn, how I manage my mind now, and what it actually takes to lead yourself when no one else is coming to save you.

⚠️ If you're going through your own reinvention — or struggling to feel like a CEO — this one's for you.

Timestamp:
0:00–0:53 Intro
0:53–4:06 The process of reinvention!
4:06–5:32 Flipping the script
5:32–6:01 The N.I.C.E Method saved me
6:01–7:27 Conclusion

episodes.title: From Cult to CEO: What nobody tells you about purpose! (Ep. 1)
episodes.description:
I used to follow every rule. Every belief. Every voice but my own.

But when I finally walked away from the community that shaped me, I started hearing something clearer—me.

This video isn’t about inspiration. It’s about strategy.

I’ll show you how I went from stuck and silenced to building a brand with purpose, clarity, and power.

If you’ve ever felt lost in life or business, watch this.

Timestamp:
0:00–1:08 Intro
1:08–2:20 Stuck in a Cult
2:20–3:14 Life after the Cult

5:26–6:10 Developing the N.I.C.E. Method

episodes.title: They Controlled My Life for 10 Years 👀 Then I Built My Own!! (Part 1)
episodes.description:
At 20, I entered a cult.
At 30, I left — no friends, no family, no roadmap.

This is the raw, unfiltered truth of how I got there, what it took from me, and how I turned the aftermath into fuel to build the life I was always meant to live.

I gave up basketball. Missed milestones. Lost time.
But after leaving, everything changed.

I didn’t just survive — I used the experience to build two businesses, earn three degrees, start a fashion label, publish a book, and create the N.I.C.E.™ method: a tool to help anyone go from stuck → successful.

I'm not fully healed — but I’m here.
This channel is for those who feel behind, confused, or like they lost years to something that wasn’t really them.

Let’s get active. Let’s get clear. Let’s get free.

Timestamp:
0:00–0:30 Intro
0:30–1:40 Cult & Experience
1:40–2:25 Post Cult
2:25–4:45 About the Channel

✅ Subscribe if you’ve ever felt stuck or behind — you’re not alone.

episodes.title: Escaping a Cult: How I Built My Life From Scratch (Part 2)
episodes.description:
Part 2 of my story.

After leaving the cult, I had nothing. Literally started from zero. No support system. No clue how to “do life.”

But urgency is a hell of a motivator.

I knew I was behind — so I moved fast.
I got my third degree. Built two brands. Became an author. Launched a fashion label.

Looking back, I realized I wasn’t just hustling randomly. I was following a pattern. That pattern became my method — the N.I.C.E.™ framework. It’s how I help others now:

✦ N = Narrative — rewrite your story
✦ I = Insight — find what you know that others don’t
✦ C = Connection — build community & confidence
✦ E = Execution — move with bold clarity

I’m not sharing this for sympathy. I’m sharing it to prove what’s possible.

If you’ve lost time… you can still catch up.
If you feel stuck… you can still move forward.

Let this be the sign you were waiting for.

Timestamp:
0:00 –1:49 How I got in the Cult
1:49–4:10 Experience in the Cult
4:10–5:29 Sense of Urgency
5:29–6:30 Accomplishments after the Cult
6:30–7:43 NICE Strategy
7:43–9:57 Conclusion
